Resources: Parallel and High Performace Computing with R

Ge Baolai

February 17, 2016

Source: vignettes/resources/Baolai_2016.Rmd
Baolai_2016.Rmd

This webinar features R and parallelization in the context of Monte Carlo simulations.

Abstract

From sharcnet.ca

In this seminar we will talk about the use of R in a parallel processing environment. We will discuss the general issues concerning the performance of R code, the intrinsic features of R and parallelization by looking at a few simple examples of Monte Carlo simulations. The targeted audience are those who have had experience with R but not much with parallel processing.
